entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 23 at 3:36PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Freezing Rain Possible South Slopes Of The Alaska Range Tonight Through Friday Night... Several inches of snow are likely along with a chance of freezing rain in the Alaska Range south of Carlo Creek and Trims Camp tonight through Friday night. If freezing rain does occur amounts will be light with only a thin glaze of ice.

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida...
